name: fasten-health
description: Fasten On-Prem is a self-hosted personal health record system that aggregates medical data from providers and patient portals into one interface, giving individuals full control and long-term storage of their health history.
features: Health Records: Aggregate medical data from providers, Unified health history, Patient portal integration. Your health, centralized.
Data Ownership: Full control of medical records. Privacy-focused storage.
Long-Term Storage: Keep your health history forever. Never lose important data.
Provider Connections: Sync from multiple healthcare sources. Comprehensive view.
FHIR Support: Standard health data format. Interoperability.
Timeline View: Visualize health history. Easy navigation.
Document Storage: Store test results and images. Complete records.
Search: Find medical information quickly. Efficient access.
Self-Hosted: Your health data stays private. Maximum security.
